channel.title: Vangaurd rsps/317/brand new/need payers/staff/ much content to be added
channel.description:
[center][center]Launched: December 13th, 2014 In need of: Community members, decision makers, and staff members, and suggestions. Not in need of: Negative feedback and harsh, unproductive criticism.
The server was launched today, and therefore we do not have A TON to put here. Do not tell us we need to add more, we know. This thread will be constantly updated.
[size=24pt][b]http://vanguardrsps.com/[/b][/size]
Some features: God-wars Bank pins 99.9% up-time, 0 lag Wonderful slayer system, free task resetting Active wilderness Custom gear that is actually useful Custom cosmetic items Players choose everything that is added into the game Easy to understand from the beginning 3 separate donator ranks Command safety nets in order to protect you More than enough NPCs in order to ensure everyone has enough Full working duel arena Community and staff sponsored events Wonderful donator benefits Tradable donator status tokens for all 3 ranks & much more
Media:[/center][/center][center][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/of0wg5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/bj5zc1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/ztor5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/1z6bi92.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/fk9m9y.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Vangaurd rsps/317/brand new/need payers/staff/ much content to be added

item.description:
@EzioAuditore1 wrote:

[center][center]Launched: December 13th, 2014
In need of: Community members, decision makers, and staff members, and suggestions.
Not in need of: Negative feedback and harsh, unproductive criticism.

The server was launched today, and therefore we do not have A TON to put here. Do not tell us we need to add more, we know. This thread will be constantly updated.

[size=24pt]http://vanguardrsps.com/[/size]

Some features:
God-wars
Bank pins
99.9% up-time, 0 lag
Wonderful slayer system, free task resetting
Active wilderness
Custom gear that is actually useful
Custom cosmetic items
Players choose everything that is added into the game
Easy to understand from the beginning
3 separate donator ranks
Command safety nets in order to protect you
More than enough NPCs in order to ensure everyone has enough
Full working duel arena
Community and staff sponsored events
Wonderful donator benefits
Tradable donator status tokens for all 3 ranks
& much more

Media:[/center][/center][center]



[/center]
